attributes.action: Announce a Third Full National Lockdown from January 2021.
attributes.additional_details: According to the independent SAGE group of scientists a full lockdown could save tens of thousands of lives. It would also support NHS PROVIDERS who have called for tighter restrictions in order to help the NHS cope with the unprecedented demands caused by the new, fast spreading covid variant.
attributes.background: I want the government to follow the advice announced by SAGE on December 30th 2020 for England to go into a full Lockdown. SAGE have already called for schools to be closed so the Lockdown must include schools and undergraduate university courses.
